ARABIC: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰٓ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: not to repay someone else for a favour done -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And is under no one's obligation to return his favour,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: not as payment for any favours that he received,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They do not expect any reward
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And no one has done a favour to him, for which he should be compensated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And who has (in mind) no favor from anyone to be paid back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And no one has with him any boon for which he should be rewarded,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and confers no favour on any man for recompense,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And none hath with him any favour for reward,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and owes no favour to anyone, which is to be repaid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And who hath no favour from anyone to recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and does not expect any reward from anyone,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And have in their minds no favour from anyone for which a reward is expected in return,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And have in his mind no favour from anyone for which a reward is expected in return,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and confers no favor upon anyone for recompense
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:19] and no one has any favour [outstanding] with him that must be requited;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And none hath with him any favour for reward, 760
